instanceVariables.name: TurnOrder
instanceVariables.desc: Which Turn number this enemy uses

instanceVariables.name: LastInTurn
instanceVariables.desc: Is this enemy the last in the turn order

instanceVariables.name: ActTime
instanceVariables.desc: Number of turns spent preparing for action, -1 randomizes

instanceVariables.name: ActThMove
instanceVariables.desc: Threshhold for "idle" turns required to move

instanceVariables.name: ActThAttack
instanceVariables.desc: Threshhold for "idle" turns required to attack

instanceVariables.name: TurnDone
instanceVariables.desc: Is the enemy done with their turn

instanceVariables.name: TurnInProgress
instanceVariables.desc: Is the turn currently being processed

instanceVariables.name: meleeDmg
instanceVariables.desc: Damage dealt by moving into player

instanceVariables.name: SkipPause
instanceVariables.desc: Skip the pause between enemy turns, = instant turn
